balaasmaha: Xaaladda walaxda ka kooban walxaha la dallacay (ions iyo electrons)
ionic: Dammaanad lagu sameeyay soo jiidasho u dhaxaysa ions-ka soo horjeeda
covalent: Bond lagu sameeyay wadaagga elektarooniga ah ee u dhexeeya atamka
macdan: Dammaanad lagu sameeyay soo jiidasho u dhaxaysa biraha togan ee birta ah iyo elektaroonnada la gooyey
dheellitirnaanta isla'egta: Isla'egta kiimikaad oo leh tiro is le'eg oo atamka ah ee shay kasta oo labada dhinac ah
bar: Unug loo isticmaalo in lagu cabbiro cadadka walaxda (Tirada qaybaha Avogadro)
tirada guud: Wadarta borotoonnada iyo neutron-yada ku jira xudunta atamka
lambarka atomiga: Tirada borotoonnada ku jira xudunta atamka (waxay go'aamisaa aqoonsiga element)
isotope: Atamyo isku mid ah oo leh tirooyin kala duwan oo neutrons ah
dib u habayn: Falcelinta kiimikaad ee ku lug leh oxidation iyo hababka dhimista labadaba
tamarta firfircoonida: Tamarta ugu yar ee loo baahan yahay falcelinta kiimikaad inay dhacdo
kicin: Walaxda kordhisa heerka falcelinta kiimikaad iyada oo aan la isticmaalin
heerkulbeegga: Qaybta kimisteriga ee khusaysa kulaylka, shaqada, heerkulka, iyo tamarta
endothermic: Falcelinta kiimikaad ee nuugta kulaylka agagaarka
ka baxsan: Falcelinta kiimikaad ee sii daaya kulaylka agagaarka
